<code>[**description**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Description of the measure.

<code>[**type**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[MeasureType](`flood_adapt.objects.measures.measures.MeasureType`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   Type of measure. Should be "MeasureType.floodwall"

:   Type of selection. Should be "SelectionType.polygon" or "SelectionType.aggregation_area".

<code>[**polygon_file**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[Optional](`typing.Optional`)\[[str](`str`)\]]{.parameter-annotation}</code>
